news.title: Electric vehicle sales slow amid charging infrastructure concerns
news.author: Eddie Munson
news.description: Consumers are delaying electric vehicle purchases as charging availability and rising costs continue to raise concerns, despite strong long-term market forecasts.

content.text: Consumers are delaying electric vehicle purchases as charging availability and rising costs continue to raise concerns, despite strong long-term market forecasts.
Electric vehicle (EV) sales have shown signs of slowing in several key markets, highlighting growing consumer hesitation around charging infrastructure and overall ownership costs.
Range anxiety is no longer the only issue â€” convenience and cost predictability are becoming equally important for consumers, said an industry analyst.
Cost concerns are also playing a major role. Although battery prices have gradually decreased, electric vehicles often still carry higher upfront costs compared to traditional combustion engine cars.

news.title: AI-powered tools reshape software development workflows
news.author: Sarah Johnson
news.description: Development teams are increasingly adopting AI-assisted coding tools that promise to boost productivity and reduce repetitive tasks.

content.text: Development teams are increasingly adopting AI-assisted coding tools that promise to boost productivity and reduce repetitive tasks.
AI tools are not replacing developers, but they are fundamentally changing what we spend our time on, noted a senior engineer.
